name: Bulk indexing of monitoring data on closed indices should throw an export exception

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-e7346d3d2019ac2d50dfbf21b1dfdc97c3a85e50 "[xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled] setting was deprecated in Elasticsearch and will be removed in a future release. See the deprecation documentation for the next major version."
